Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Human complement factor H deficiency associated with hemolytic uremic syndrome .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Human complement factor H deficiency |
| hemolytic uremic syndrome |

The two "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph are "Human complement factor H deficiency" and "hemolytic uremic syndrome". They are presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| hemolytic uremic syndrome |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Disease" entity is "hemolytic uremic syndrome". The other entity, "Human complement factor H deficiency", is not clearly a disease, but rather a deficiency of a protein involved in the complement system. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
